item.title: Learn how to create a Password Generator in C
item.description: Having a strong password is a must today. A strong password means better security. It may get exhausting thinking of strong passwords when you have to create an account for something, almost everyday. To make our lives easy, today we will write a program which can provide you with random passwords. Objectives to accomplish with the password generator are: Greet the user Ask for the length of the password Generate a random password Output that password to the user To start off we are going to use functions from three different libraries so we’ll include these into our code.
